import React,{useState}from'react';import{Button,CircularProgress,Box}from'@mui/material';import{getMatchHistoryWithWinRate}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function LoadMoreMatches(_ref){let{puuid,limit,offset,setOffset,matches,setMatches,setWins,setLosses,setWinRate}=_ref;const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[allMatchesLoaded,setAllMatchesLoaded]=useState(false);const loadMoreMatches=async()=>{if(loading||allMatchesLoaded)return;setLoading(true);const matchHistoryData=await getMatchHistoryWithWinRate(puuid,limit,offset);if(!matchHistoryData.error){setMatches(prevMatches=>[...prevMatches,...matchHistoryData.matchDetails]);setOffset(offset+limit);// Update offset for the next load
setAllMatchesLoaded(matchHistoryData.matchDetails.length<limit);setWins(matchHistoryData.wins);setLosses(matchHistoryData.losses);setWinRate(matchHistoryData.winRate);}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{display:"flex",justifyContent:"center",mt:2,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",onClick:loadMoreMatches,disabled:loading||allMatchesLoaded,children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CircularProgress,{size:24,color:"inherit"}):'Load More Matches'})});}export default LoadMoreMatches;
